sentence.Network_en: He treats everyone equally and considerately.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对待每一个人都一视同仁，体贴周到。

sentence.Network_en: Sorrow makes us go slower and more considerately, and introspect our motives and dispositions.
sentence.Network_cn: 忧愁使我们想得更周到,不致操之过急, 以及深深体察我们的动机和目标.

sentence.Network_en: Our service is just like the sunshine shine on every student warmly considerately.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的服务有如阳光般温暖、到、耀着每一个学员!

对价（consideration）(Consideration)是英美法中有关合同成立所必须具备的一个要素。按英美法解释，合同当事人之间存在着我给你是为了你给我的关 …

entry.def: Someone who is considerate pays attention to the needs, wishes, or feelings of other people.

example.ex: I think he's the most charming, most considerate man I've ever known...
example.tran: 我觉得他是我所认识的最有魅力并且最为体贴的男士。

example.ex: I've always understood one should try and be considerate of other people.
example.tran: 我一直认为一个人应该尽量为他人着想。

auth_sentence.content: When challenged, he listens carefully and considerately, and occasionally tempers his ire.
auth_sentence.res_content: When challenged, he listens carefully and considerately, and occasionally tempers his ire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When challenged, he listens carefully and considerately, and occasionally tempers his ire.

auth_sentence.content: When thou prayest do it considerately, advisedly, with the whole Intention of thy Soul.
auth_sentence.res_content: When thou prayest do it considerately, advisedly, with the whole Intention of thy Soul.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When thou prayest do it considerately, advisedly, with the whole Intention of thy Soul.
